cyclone.name: MARIA
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west-northwest toward the Leeward Islands and then into the northeastern Caribbean Sea

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and tropical-storm watches confined to the northern Leeward Islands, Virgin Islands, and Puerto Rico
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings from Guadeloupe southward to Dominica, St. Kitts–Nevis–Montserrat, and Martinique; tropical-storm warnings for Antigua–Barbuda, Saba–St. Eustatius, and St. Lucia
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and northern Lesser Antilles (Leeward Islands) during the next 24–48 h
